law.text:
A letter of credit, confirmation, advice, transfer, amendment, or cancellation may be issued in any form that is a record and is authenticated:
By a signature; or
In accordance with the agreement of the parties or the standard practice referred to in KRS 355.5-108(5).
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 408, sec. 4, effective July 1, 2001. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 5-104, effective July 1, 1960.
